title: Semantic Location History
description: A Semantic Location History JSON file in a Google Takeout Location History extraction. Contains Semantic Location History information from the user's account. Typically this will be a file containing data for a single month, with a name such as `2021_JANUARY.json`.

timelineObjects.title: Timeline Objects
timelineObjects.description: List of all available semantic information, in chronological order. Each item in the list is either an ![#/$defs/activitySegment] or a ![#/$defs/placeVisit], encapsulated in a generic ![#/properties/timelineObjects/items].

items.title: Timeline Object
items.description: Encapsulates either an ![#/$defs/activitySegment] or a ![#/$defs/placeVisit], depending on the single key found.

activitySegment.title: Activity Segment
activitySegment.description: An activity involving changes in location, usually a journey from one place to another, such as a walk, a car drive, a bus ride, or a flight.

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: Distance traveled during the activity, in meters.

activityType.title: Activity Type
activityType.description: Best match activity type. Corresponds to the activity type with the highest probability in [#/$defs/activitySegment/properties/activities].

activities.title: Activities
activities.description: List of all the considered candidate activity types and their probabilities. The sum of all the probabilities is always <= 100.

confidence.title: Confidence
confidence.description: Confidence that the chosen activity type (see [#/$defs/activitySegment/properties/activityType]) is correct. One of: `LOW`, `MEDIUM`, `HIGH` or `UNKNOWN_CONFIDENCE`. Activities that have been manually confirmed always have a confidence of `HIGH`.

source.title: Source
source.description: Source of the location data of the path. Either `BACKFILLED` or `INFERRED`.

distanceMeters.title: Distance in meters
distanceMeters.description: Total distance of the path, in meters.

transitPath.title: Transit Path
transitPath.description: Path taken in a public transit system, such as a bus or a metro.

editConfirmationStatus.title: Edit-Confirmation Status
editConfirmationStatus.description: Whether the user has manually edited the activity segment. Can be `NOT_CONFIRMED` or `CONFIRMED`.

placeVisit.title: Place Visit
placeVisit.description: A visit or stay at a place in a fixed location for a duration of time, such as a stay at home, at work, a visit to a shopping mall, or to a restaurant.

centerLatE7.title: Center Latitude
centerLatE7.description: Latitude coordinate of the location. Degrees multiplied by 10^7 and rounded to the nearest integer, in the range -900000000 to +900000000 (divide value by 10^7 for the usual range -90° to +90°).

centerLngE7.title: Center Longitude
centerLngE7.description: Longitude coordinate of the location. Degrees multiplied by 10^7 and rounded to the nearest integer, in the range -1800000000 to +1800000000 (divide value by 10^7 for the usual range -180° to +180°).

placeConfidence.title: Place Confidence
placeConfidence.description: Categorized confidence for this place visit. One of: `LOW_CONFIDENCE`, `MEDIUM_CONFIDENCE`, `HIGH_CONFIDENCE` or `USER_CONFIRMED`.
placeConfidence.helpWanted: Is this directly related to [#/$defs/placeVisit/properties/locationConfidence] and/or [#/$defs/placeVisit/properties/visitConfidence]

placeVisitLevel.title: Place Visit Level
placeVisitLevel.description: Level (depth) of this place visit. This value increases by 1 with each recursive access to a [#/$defs/placeVisit/properties/childVisits] entry.

editConfirmationStatus.title: Edit-Confirmation Status
editConfirmationStatus.description: Whether the user has manually edited the place visit. Can be `NOT_CONFIRMED` or `CONFIRMED`.

checkin.title: Checkin
checkin.helpWanted: The meaning of this field is uncertain.

latitudeE7.title: Latitude
latitudeE7.description: Latitude coordinate of the location. Degrees multiplied by 10^7 and rounded to the nearest integer, in the range -900000000 to +900000000 (divide value by 10^7 for the usual range -90° to +90°).

longitudeE7.title: Longitude
longitudeE7.description: Longitude coordinate of the location. Degrees multiplied by 10^7 and rounded to the nearest integer, in the range -1800000000 to +1800000000 (divide value by 10^7 for the usual range -180° to +180°).

semanticType.title: Semantic Type
semanticType.description: Place type based on semantic information specific to the user.

accuracyMetres.title: Accuracy in meters
accuracyMetres.description: Approximate accuracy radius of the location measurement, in meters. A lower value means better precision.

sourceInfo.title: Source Information
sourceInfo.description: Information on the source that provided the location.

deviceTag.title: Device Tag
deviceTag.description: Integer identifier (specific to Location History) associated with the device that obtained the location. Refer to `deviceSettings` in Settings.json for information about the device with this `deviceTag`.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of time defined by a start timestamp and an end timestamp.

probability.title: Probability
probability.description: Probability (or confidence) that the activity type is correct, in the range 0 to 100.

semanticType.title: Semantic Type
semanticType.description: Place type based on semantic information specific to the user.

oneOf.title: Type Home
oneOf.description: The place has been designated as 'Home' by the user. See: [Set or change your home & work addresses](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/3093979?hl=en).

oneOf.title: Type Work
oneOf.description: The place has been designated as 'Work' by the user. See: [Set or change your home & work addresses](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/3093979?hl=en).

oneOf.title: Type Searched Address
oneOf.description: The user has searched for this place in the past.

oneOf.title: Type Aliased Location
oneOf.description: The place has been given a private label by the user. See: [Give a place a private label](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/6257830?hl=en).

points.title: Points
points.description: List of all the recorded points that form the path.

source.title: Source
source.description: Source of the location data of the path. One of `BACKFILLED`, `INFERRED`, or `RESNAPPED_FOR_EDIT`.

distanceMeters.title: Distance in meters
distanceMeters.description: Distance traveled with the path, in meters.

transitPath.title: Transit Path
transitPath.description: A path taken in a public transit system, such as a bus or a metro. Note that it does not describe an entire transit line, but only a specific journey a user does in a transit line.

transitStops.title: Transit Stops
transitStops.description: List of locations of the transit stops used.

hexRgbColor.title: Hexadecimal RGB Color
hexRgbColor.description: Color of the transit line in hexadecimal in the form *RRGGBB*.

linePlaceId.title: Line Place ID
linePlaceId.description: Google Maps [Place ID](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/places/web-service/place-id) of the transit line.

stopTimesInfo.title: Stop Times Info
stopTimesInfo.description: Time information (departure and arrival times, both real and scheduled) for each transit stop used.

items.title: Stop Time Info
items.description: Departure and/or arrival time information (both real and scheduled) for a stop at a transit line.

source.title: Source
source.description: Source of the location data of the transit path. Either `BACKFILLED` or `INFERRED`.

distanceMeters.title: Distance in meters
distanceMeters.description: Distance traveled with the transit path, in meters.

latE7.title: Latitude
latE7.description: Latitude coordinate of the waypoint. Degrees multiplied by 10^7 and rounded to the nearest integer, in the range -900000000 to +900000000 (divide value by 10^7 for the usual range -90° to +90°).

lngE7.title: Longitude
lngE7.description: Longitude coordinate of the waypoint. Degrees multiplied by 10^7 and rounded to the nearest integer, in the range -1800000000 to +1800000000 (divide value by 10^7 for the usual range -180° to +180°).

latE7.title: Latitude
latE7.description: Latitude coordinate of the point. Degrees multiplied by 10^7 and rounded to the nearest integer, in the range -900000000 to +900000000 (divide value by 10^7 for the usual range -90° to +90°).

lngE7.title: Longitude
lngE7.description: Longitude coordinate of the point. Degrees multiplied by 10^7 and rounded to the nearest integer, in the range -1800000000 to +1800000000 (divide value by 10^7 for the usual range -180° to +180°).

accuracyMeters.title: Accuracy in meters
accuracyMeters.description: Approximate accuracy radius of the location measurement, in meters. A lower value means better precision.

editConfirmationStatus.title: Edit Confirmation Status
editConfirmationStatus.description: Indicates wether the user has manually edited the entry. Can be `NOT_CONFIRMED` or `CONFIRMED`.
